Hi! Jomar Regalario

Im a Web Developer

Let me Introduce my self


I'm Jomar Regalario.


I was born in San Jose Camarines Sur, From an early age I showed interest for computers and that grew into a passion during college school.


I got into web design and development in college, attending the La Concepcion College in San Jose Del Monte Bulacan was the best decision I ever made because it showed me what i wanted to do for the rest of my life.


Currently im improving my skills in Web Development using HTML, CSS and JavaScript and hopefully next time i can do learn more about framesworks.
